resources.string: As per directive of the AICTE under National Ragging Prevention Project, all the aspirant candidates along with their parents/guardians are advised to go to the website www.antiragging.in or www.amanmovement.org , fill up and submit the Affidavits online and take a printout of the submitted Affidavits (both student and parent) and submit the same to the Institute Officials while taking their admission in MCKVIE during the admission process. Ragging is neither a ritual nor a custom in campus life. It is a punishable criminal offence. MCKVIE strongly discourages ragging and stringent action is taken against offenders. New students are welcome to join MCKVIE without any fear or apprehension.
